definition[0]: consisting of or relating to the cells of plants or animals
definition[1]: a cellular telephone system works by using a network of radio stations to pass on signals
definition[2]: a cellular telephone system uses short-range radio signals so that users can carry telephones around with them
example[1]: Since 1989, the number of cellular phones in use in the US has grown by a factor of 22.
example[2]: Fast growth is forecast in the cellular market.
example[3]: a large group of independent cellular companies
